Events that occurred on 28 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1949 - The letter "Cardinal Mindszenty", co-signed by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published in The Times.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Doris Elizabeth Sykes.
1981 - Actor Elijah Wood is born.
1982 - The Old English Exodus is published.
1982 - Angmar: Land of the Witch King is published.
1994 - Actress Ema Horvath is born.
2003 - Swedish author Astrid Lindgren dies.
